home.tagline: From wall paintings to art workshops
home.taglineSub: - I create unique experiences that will stay in your memory.

wallPaintings.title: Wall paintings
wallPaintings.subtitle: Unique paintings for your space
wallPaintings.description: I create unique wall paintings that bring your space to life. From children's rooms to business spaces - each painting is a unique story.
wallPaintings.offerText: Paintings for children's rooms, kindergartens, schools, business spaces, cafes, and other public spaces. Each painting is designed according to your wishes and adapted to the space.
wallPaintings.ctaDescription: Contact me for a free consultation and quote.
